comment.author: 20942601@N00
comment._content: It is  interesting that the picture is so clear while the men are in motion. Cameras usually required their subjects to be still when a picture was taken. It is also good to see that the Chinese where willing to serve in the United States armed services.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Rear Admiral Ching Pih Kwang and Mayor Gaynor are seen at right.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: lifeasdaddy: Thanks for the additional info. about Kwang's visit. We'll add it to the description next time we update the record.
